name: Multi-Currency Wallet
description:
E-Wallet App UI Kit is equipped with iOS/Android support (design system included) which is 100% editable & customizable. Designs are available in Figma.


This wallet is designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. The wallet is equipped and inspired by Cuberto Design with a design system with various of components. The Design System has been equipped with typography, iconography, color styles, components, elements, buttons, avatars, checkboxes, chips, grids, and many others.


Donate?

In addition, the application design in figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to edit, delete, or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.


Thank you!
